author: Fextralife
description:
I PLAYED Hollow Knight: Silksong - Gamescom DEMO and INFO
In this Fextralife video, I'm going to be talking a little bit about Hollow Knight Silksong, a game maybe some of you guys have heard of. I think this is going to be one that our community will have been following closely. I got to go hands-on with it at Gamescom this year. So in this video, I'm not only going to be talking about the Ninja announced, dropping on September 4th, which, if you haven't heard of the game, is actually coming out in a week.

Timestamp
0:00 - Silksong Gamescom Hands On Preview
0:57 - Hands-on experience
3:03 - Our plans for Silksong
3:47 - simultaneous launch
4:40 - Final Thoughts 

Don't forget to like the video and subscribe to our channel for more!
